title: Mixpanel Utils Package
text: goal mixpanelutils provide certain utility functions work Mixpanel enrich functionality. package wraps Mixpanel Ingestion API. suggested use environmental variables store certain credentials: MP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME MP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN MP_PROJECT_ID credentials can found Project Settings Mixpanel.

title: Mixpanel Utils Package
text: can install development version mixpanelutils GitHub :

title: Mixpanel Utils Package
text: basic example shows lookup tables currently present Project: function replace_lookup_table() helps name suggests replacing lookup table updated version.
code: library(mixpanelutils)  get_lookup_tables(mp_service_account_name = Sys.getenv("MP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME"),                   mp_service_account_secret = Sys.getenv("MP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN"),                   mp_project_id = Sys.getenv("MP_PROJECT_ID")) replace_lookup_table(mp_service_account_name = Sys.getenv("MP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_NAME"),                     mp_service_account_secret = Sys.getenv("MP_SERVICE_ACCOUNT_TOKEN"),                     mp_project_id = Sys.getenv("MP_PROJECT_ID"),                     lookup_table_id = "1234",                     table_to_replace = df)
